event.title: New Year Social
event.description:
Are you ready for another year of great ACCU events? We're kicking off 2020 with a visit to Left Handed Giant (https://lefthandedgiant.com). Join us for an evening of food, drinks, and intelligent* conversation.

*Subject to units of alcohol consumed.

P.S. - Please RSVP to this event if you wish to attend. This year's venue is a popular one, so seating cannot be guaranteed unless reserved in advance.
